title: Fears grow for missing schoolgirl, 14, as police issue urgent appeal for helping finding her
text:
Simone Hughes, 14, was last seen in Flamborough on Wednesday

Ann urgent appeal has been issued to find a schoolgirl who has been missing for more than 24 hours.

Simone Hughes, 14, was last seen in Flamborough at 11am on Wednesday morning.

Humberside Police are becoming increasingly concerned about her whereabouts and have now issued an appeal to the public.

She is described as 5ft 5in with shoulder length straight blonde hair. Police say she could be in the Bridlington area.

Simone was last spotted wearing a white padded jacket and pink trainers, officers said.

A Humberside Police spokesman said: 'Appeal to find 14-year-old Simone Hughes last seen in Flamborough at 11pm yesterday, on Wednesday, October 9.

'Last seen wearing a white padded jacket and pink trainers.

'She is 5ft 5ins tall with shoulder length straight blonde hair and may be in the Bridlington area.'

Anyone with any information should call police on 101, using log 72 of October 10.
description: Simone Hughes, 14, was last seen in Flamborough at 11am on Wednesday morning. Humberside Police have now issued an appeal after she was reported missing.
